19917.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>科佩:

19923.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>真開心，沒人在家耶……<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19924.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>那我就不客氣了。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19928.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵呀！被人發現啦────！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19929.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>我就:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>我就覺得有點吵，

19930.<start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>啊─: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>啊──是貓──是貓貓──<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27191.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>上天有好生之德，求求你饒了我吧──！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19932.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>……:

19934.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>我可不能被抓……<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19936.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>都是:

19937.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>……:

114406.<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>說起:

28065.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>大哥……我給你拿吃的來了。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28069.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:

28070.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:

28074.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……:

28075.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:

28076.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:

28077.<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……:

28079.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:

28081.<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><p:
